meanings.definition: The study of numbers, quantities, and shapes.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy learning math in school.
meanings.sent2: Math helps us understand numbers better.
meanings.sent3: My cat tried to do math with his toy mice.
meanings.sent4: Math is like a puzzle that helps us solve real-life problems.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of math lies in its ability to explain the world around us.

meanings.definition: A branch of knowledge dealing with the logic of quantity and shape.
meanings.sent1: My favorite subject is math because I love shapes.
meanings.sent2: Studying math involves understanding different quantities.
meanings.sent3: I asked the tree if it knew any math about branches.
meanings.sent4: In a way, math is the language of the universe, speaking through shapes and numbers.
meanings.sent5: The elegance of math is in its ability to describe the patterns in nature.
